Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 22nd overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1973...
Released by Boston (UBA) on 11/3/1976...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 11/3/1976 to a 1-year deal worth $436,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/25/1977...
Injured on 6/9/1977 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Manchester on 2/9/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 6/19/1984, off Bill Lingle (TOL)...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/4/1986 to a 4-year deal worth $1,758,400 per year...
Released by Plum Grove on 7/21/1988...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/19/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $1,090,000 per year...
